original_text: Then all the congregation raised a loud cry, and the people wept that night.
korean_text: 온 회중이 소리를 높여 부르짖으며 백성이 밤새도록 통곡하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then all the congregation raised a loud cry
sentences.korean_translation: 이에 온 회중이 큰 소리로 부르짖고

sentences.original_text: and the people wept that night
